item.title: [MPC] Model Predictive Control with discrete-time Control Barrier Functions
item.description: The MPC-CBF optimization problem is given by: $$\begin{aligned} \min_{u_{t: t+N-1 \mid t}} \quad & \frac{1}{2} \tilde{x}_N^T Q_x \tilde{x}_N+\sum_{k=0}^{N-1} \frac{1}{2} \tilde{x}_k^T Q_x \tilde{x}_k+\frac{1}{2} u_k^T Q_u u_k\\ \textrm{s.t.} \quad & x_{t+k+1 \mid t}=x_{t+k \mid t}+f\left(x_{t+k \mid t}, u_{t+k \mid t}\right) \cdot T_s, \quad k=0, . ., N-1,\\ & x_{\min } \leq x_{t+k \mid t} \leq x_{\max }, \quad k=0, \ldots, N-1,\\ & u_{\min } \leq u_{t+k \mid t} \leq u_{\max }, \quad k=0, \ldots, N-1, \\ & x_{t \mid t}=x_t, \\ & \Delta h\left(x_{t+k \mid t}, u_{t+k \mid t}\right) \geq-\gamma h\left(x_{t+k \mid t}\right), \quad k=0, \ldots, N-1 \\ \end{aligned}$$
